This package was developed to house a program to 'Paint' 3D PDB structures with proteomics logfc intensities. 

Current R version tested - 4.5.1 

Download the package .tar.gz into folder of your choosing. 


To install the package:

1. Install remotes 
```{r}
install.packages("remotes")
```

2. Install ShinyPDBPainter Package - change the file path to local file location.
```{r}
remotes::install_local("localfolder/ShinyPDBPainter_0.0.0.9000.tar.gz")
```

3. Wait for installation including all dependencies. 

This will only need to occur the first time you run ShinyPDBPainter, you will only need to run the app itself for subsequent use. 



To Run ShinyPDBPainter

1. To run the app, run the code: 

```{r}
#if running for the second time after installation, ensure you have first run 
#library(ShinyPDBPainter)

run_app()
```
